meanings.definition: Able to be shared with others.
meanings.sent1: The cake was sharable among all the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: The document was sharable with the entire team for collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The secret recipe was sharable only with those who promised not to tell.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter was sharable, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The happiness of winning the game was sharable, bringing smiles to all faces.

meanings.sent1: The large pizza was sharable for the whole family to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The link to the article was sharable on social media platforms.
meanings.sent3: The funny meme was sharable with friends to brighten their day.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was sharable, uplifting those around her.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset view was sharable, capturing the hearts of many.

meanings.definition: Capable of being divided or distributed among multiple people.
meanings.sent1: The prize money was sharable among the top three winners.
meanings.sent2: The workload was sharable among team members for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The responsibility was sharable, ensuring everyone had a part to play.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was sharable, touching the lives of many in need.
meanings.sent5: The love for music was sharable, connecting people from different backgrounds.
